testcase.name: Replen
testcase.system-out: Step 1: Logging in... Using login URL: https://erp.poundshop.com/login Username: Hitesh Login successful. Step 2: Clicking on Storage +... Step 3: Clicking on Smart Replen... Step 4: Clicking on Order Replen... Step 5: Clicking on Smart Replen (exact)... Step 6: Opening Filter (1)... Step 7: Clicking Apply on Filter... Step 8: Reopening Filter (1)... Step 9: Clicking Cancel on Filter... Smart ReplenTest completed.
